titleStmt.title: A new ditty, shewing the wonderfull miracles of our Lord and Sauiour Iesus Christ [sic], which he did while he remained vpon earth To the tune of Triumph and Ioy.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "VVhen Iesus Christ was twlue yéeres".
Publisher's name and publication date from STC.
Reproduction of original in the Pepysian Library, Magdalene College, Cambridge, England.
